alert.note: Alert for Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains; Gallatin Valley; Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains; Madison River Valley; Meagher County Valleys (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 23 at 5:55PM MST until December 23 at 8:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations up to one half inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains, Meagher County Valleys, Gallatin Valley, Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains and Madison River Valley. * WHEN...Until 8 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains; Gallatin Valley; Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains; Madison River Valley; Meagher County Valleys
